mapper.select: SELECT DBMS_RANDOM.STRING('X', 15) AS MEM_SID FROM DUAL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JOIN_MEMBER(JM_SID, MEM_SID, JM_ID, JM_PW, JM_NAME, JM_SSN, JM_GENDER, JM_NICKNAME, JM_TEL, JM_ADDR1, JM_ADDR2, JM_ZIPCODE, JM_IMAGE) VALUES(SEQ_JM.NEXTVAL, #{memSid}, #{jmId},CRYPTPACK.ENCRYPT(#{jmPw}, #{jmPw}), #{jmName}, #{jmSsn}, #{jmGender} , #{jmNickName}, #{jmTel}, #{jmAddr1}, #{jmAddr2}, #{jmZipCode}, #{jmImage})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(MEM_SID), '0') AS MEM_SID FROM JOIN_MEMBER WHERE JM_ID= #{jmId} AND JM_PW = CRYPTPACK.ENCRYPT(#{jmPw}, #{jmPw})
SELECT NVL( (SELECT WTLECOUNT FROM WALK_COUNT_AVG_VIEW WHERE MEMSID = #{memSid}), 0 ) AS WTLECOUNT FROM DUAL
SELECT NVL( (SELECT STLECOUNT FROM SITTING_FOLLOWINGCOUNT_VIEW WHERE MEMSID = #{memSid}), 0 ) AS STLECOUNT FROM DUAL
SELECT JM_NICKNAME FROM JOIN_MEMBER WHERE JM_ID= #{jmId} AND JM_PW = CRYPTPACK.ENCRYPT(#{jmPw}, #{jmPw})
SELECT NVL(MAX(JM_ID), '0') AS JM_ID FROM JOIN_MEMBER WHERE JM_NAME = #{jmName} AND JM_SSN = #{jmSsn}
SELECT NVL(MAX(MEM_SID), '0') FROM JOIN_MEMBER WHERE JM_ID = #{jmId} AND JM_SSN = #{jmSsn} AND JM_NAME = #{jmName}
mapper.update: UPDATE JOIN_MEMBER SET JM_PW = CRYPTPACK.ENCRYPT(#{jmPw}, #{jmPw}) WHERE MEM_SID = #{memSid}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM JOIN_MEMBER WHERE JM_ID = #{jmId}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM JOIN_MEMBER WHERE JM_NICKNAME = #{jmNickName}

SELECT JM_ID AS USER_ID, JM_NAME AS USER_NAME,JM_GENDER AS USER_GENDER, JM_NICKNAME AS USER_NICKNAME ,JM_TEL AS USER_TEL, MEM_REGIST_DATE AS USER_REGIST FROM JOIN_MEMBER JM LEFT JOIN MEMBER MEM ON JM.MEM_SID = MEM.MEM_SID

SELECT COUNT(PRC.PRC_SID) AS PRCCOUNT FROM PROFILE_REPORT_COMPLETE PRC JOIN INDEX_MANAGER_ACTION IMA ON PRC.IMA_SID = IMA.IMA_SID JOIN PROFILE_REPORT_RECEIVE PRR ON PRC.PRR_SID = PRR.PRR_SID WHERE IMA.IMA_SID = 4 AND PRC.PRC_DATE = SYSDATE AND PRR.REPORTED_MEM_SID = #{memSid}
